content: basic washcloth materials worsted weight cotton yarn 2 colors of sugar n cream hook size h/8 5mm tapestry needle gauge 4 single_crochet and 2 row = 1 in pattern body - with color a chain 24 does not include turning chain - *turn your work - single_crochet to end of row* - repeat from * to * for 22 row - finish off border - join color b with a slip_stitch into a corner of your work - half_double_crochet across the row stop at the opposite corner - 3 half_double_crochet in the corner stitch - half_double_crochet down the side of your work you will have 22 stitches - continue around - join with a slip_stitch to the beginning of color b - fasten_off and weave in your ends with the tapestry needle note the washcloth also works well while using half_double_crochet for the body and double_crochet for the border
